caption: The image is an Instagram post featuring a man wearing a pink hat. The post is captioned with a motivational message about facing Mondays and starting new beginnings. The post also includes the time of 07:00 and the date of Monday, November 14th, 2021.
texts: When you face Monday, imagine that you have 52 times to start new beginnings in a year.
